name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Marc P. BRIGIDI, Respondent

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Marc P. BRIGIDI, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
'PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of December, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, rephrased for clarity, is:
Whether the evidentiary requirements of 75 Pa.C.S. § 1547(c)(1) apply in proceedings arising under 18 Pa.C.S. § 6808.
opinions.author: 'PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
985 A.2d 1259
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Marc P. BRIGIDI, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 29, 2009.
